SEARCH
Package businesslayer

Class RecipientsBusinessLogic

java.lang.Object
businesslayer.RecipientsBusinessLogic
public class RecipientsBusinessLogic extends Object
This class as the business logic calls the methods implemented in RecipientsDaoImpl class on data access layer. It contains a default constructor and six(6) methods including calling each method in RecipientsDaoImpl class.
Since:
JDK 21 (Default)
Version:
1.0
Author:
Xin Wang
See Also:
  • List
  • RecipientsDao

  • Constructor Details

    • RecipientsBusinessLogic

      public RecipientsBusinessLogic()
      This is the default constructor for RecipientsBusinessLogic. It is used to initialize a new instance of RecipientsDaoImpl.

  • Method Details

    • getMetaData

      public List<String[]> getMetaData()
      This method calls recipientsDao instance to return a list containing string arrays recording metadata.
      Returns:
      The list includes string arrays recording metadata.

    • getAllRecipients

      public List<RecipientDTO> getAllRecipients()
      This method calls recipientsDao instance to return a list including all recipients data.
      Returns:
      The list contains all recipients data.

    • getRecipient

      public RecipientDTO getRecipient(Integer awardID)
      This method calls recipientsDao instance to retrieve a recipient data in the kind of DTO according to AwardID received.
      Parameters:
      awardID - The AwardID received to retrieve a specific recipient
      Returns:
      The RecipientDTO based on AwardID derived

    • addRecipient

      public void addRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
      This method calls recipientsDao instance to insert a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The RecipientDTO received to be inserted to data source

    • updateRecipient

      public void updateRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
      This method calls recipientsDao instance to update a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The RecipientDTO received to be updated in data source

    • deleteRecipient

      public void deleteRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
      This method calls recipientsDao instance to delete a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The RecipientDTO received to be deleted in data source
